head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MIRKINSON, NATALIE KLEIN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MIRKINSON, NATALIE KLEIN

block.p: MIRKINSON-Natalie Klein. On September 19, 2000 of Roslyn, NY. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Arthur Mirkinson. Dear mother of Judith, Laura and Susan. Adored grandmother of Ona, Gemma, Jack, Rebecca, Hannah, Avram, Mara and Zoe. Services today 2PM at Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Blvd, Manhasset, L.I. Donations to Hadassah
